name: files_version_detail
description:
Retrieves the details of a file version
#### Returns

Returns a JSON object with a `data` key containing the representation of the requested file, if the request was successful.

If the request is unsuccessful, an `errors` key containing information about the failure will be returned. Refer to the [list of error codes](#tag/Errors-and-Error-Codes) to understand why this request may have failed.

file_id.description: The unique identifier of the file from which you want to retrieve versions.

version_id.description: The file version number you want to retrieve.

$ul: **attributes**: The properties of the file versions entity.
**content_type**: MIME content-type for the file (null if unavailable).
**date_created**: The date of the file version creation, as an iso8601 formatted timestamp.
**size**: Size of the file in bytes.
**id**: The identifier of the file version.
**links**: Links to alternative representations of the file version entity.
**html**: A link to the html version page.
**self**: A link to the detail page for a file version.
**type**: The type identifier of the file versions entity (`file_versions`).
